abstract: Citigroup and Wells Fargo agreed to a cease-fire until Wednesday in the legal warfare over their bids for the Wachovia Corporation.
snippet: Citigroup and Wells Fargo agreed to a cease-fire until Wednesday in the legal warfare over their bids for the Wachovia Corporation.
lead_paragraph: Prodded by the Federal Reserve, Citigroup and Wells Fargo agreed to a cease-fire until Wednesday in the legal warfare over their competing bids for the Wachovia Corporation.

abstract: IN hindsight, we all have perfect vision. But there are some merger and acquisition transactions concocted at the height of the credit bubble — and even after it burst — that looked ill-fated from the get-go.
snippet: IN hindsight, we all have perfect vision. But there are some merger and acquisition transactions concocted at the height of the credit bubble — and even after it burst — that looked ill-fated from the get-go.
lead_paragraph: IN hindsight, we all have perfect vision. But there are some merger and acquisition transactions concocted at the height of the credit bubble — and even after it burst — that looked ill-fated from the get-go. With few exceptions they proved deadly for the executives who engineered them and shareholders who supported them.

headline.main: Deals That Were Doomed from the Start: A Look Back
headline.print_headline: Deals That Were Doomed from the Start: A Look Back

abstract: Looking to sell your company? Good luck. But sellers aren’t suffering alone: Their lawyers, forced to contend with buyers that impose tough conditions, are facing hard times as well.
snippet: Looking to sell your company? Good luck. But sellers aren’t suffering alone: Their lawyers, forced to contend with buyers that impose tough conditions, are facing hard times as well.
lead_paragraph: Looking to sell your company? Good luck. Stock prices are down and volatility is high, making it difficult to settle on a price. Only the safest of borrowers can get credit to pay for a deal, and private equity buyers are stuck on the sidelines.

headline.main: Tough Times for Sellers’ Lawyers as Buyers Play Hardball on Deals
headline.print_headline: Tough Times for Sellers’ Lawyers As Buyers Play Hardball on Deals

abstract: How to create a campaign projecting confidence in Washington Mutual, to be remembered as having suffered the largest bank failure of its time?
snippet: How to create a campaign projecting confidence in Washington Mutual, to be remembered as having suffered the largest bank failure of its time?
lead_paragraph: It was a daunting task for any ad agency copywriter. In the last 10 days of the life of Washington Mutual  Sept. 15 to Sept. 25  terrified customers withdrew $17 billion in deposits from the failing savings and loan, which federal regulators then took over and sold to JPMorgan Chase for $1.9 billion.

headline.main: Ads That Soothe When Banks Are Failing
headline.print_headline: Marketing Campaigns Aim to Soothe Clients When Banks Are Failing
